Room.Name: Jay's Smith Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large shop where all kinds of weapons and armor lie about.
Room.LongDescription: Several young boys are working the bellows as a stout dwarf hammers out a sword from a rod of glowing iron. There is a clerk also near the front of the shop. It looks like you can purchase new and used armor here, as well as get a few things repaired.
